record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 22, 2007)

[Page: H11820]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 983 on H.R. 189, I am not recorded because I was absent due to flight delays returning to Washington. Had I been present, I would have voted "nay."
On rollcall No. 984 on H.R. 523, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
On rollcall No. 985 on H. Res. 762, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
